ygData.subject: RE: Enchanter spell research components...
ygData.msgSnippet: They are random drops on higher level (16+) mobs.  It seems like you tend to find more of items you don t need so you may have to trade for or buy some of the
ygData.messageBody:
They are random drops on higher level (16+) mobs. It seems like you tend to
find more of items you don't need so you may have to trade for or buy some
of the ones you need.

-- Elidain Wrathbringer
-- Leader of Crimson Guard
-- 24th level Wizard, Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Ott [mailto:mott@...]

> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanter spell research components...
>
>
> From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
>

> grimoire for the
> levitate spell, etc.
